TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ClientScriptManager extends System.Object

summary.span: Defines methods for managing client scripts in Web applications.

span.span: Defines methods for managing client scripts in Web applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于管理客户端脚本并将它们添加到 Web 应用程序。The class is used to manage client scripts and add them to Web applications. 你可以获取对引用类属性对象。You can get a reference to the class from the property of the object. 以声明方式你可以包括脚本页的 HTML 标记中，从而将客户端脚本添加到网页。You can add a client script to a Web page declaratively by including the script in the HTML markup of the page. 但是，有一些情形时动态添加客户端脚本需要如此。However, there are situations when adding client script dynamically is needed. 若要动态添加脚本时，使用方法，方法，方法，或方法，具体取决于你何时以及如何想要添加脚本。To add a script dynamically, use the method, the method, the method, or the method, depending on when and how you want to add the script. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 添加客户端脚本动态添加到 ASP.NET Web 页](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e89f1306-e43d-49ae-a66a-e18b71007666)。For more information, see [How to: Add Client Script Dynamically to ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e89f1306-e43d-49ae-a66a-e18b71007666). 类将唯一标识按的键的脚本和。The class uniquely identifies scripts by a key and a . 具有相同键和类型的脚本被视为重复项。Scripts with the same key and type are considered duplicates. 使用脚本类型可帮助避免混淆类似脚本从可能用在本页中的其他用户控件。Using the script type helps to avoid confusing similar scripts from different user controls that might be in use on the page. 类可以用于调用客户端回调在情况下，需要从客户端运行服务器代码，而不执行回发时。The class can be used to invoke client callbacks in situations when it is desirable to run server code from the client without performing a postback. 这称为执行的带回调到服务器。This is referred to as performing an out-of-band callback to the server. 在客户端回调中，客户端脚本函数将的异步请求发送到 ASP.NET 网页。In a client callback, a client script function sends an asynchronous request to an ASP.NET Web page. 网页上运行其正常的生命周期的修改的版本来处理回调。The Web page runs a modified version of its normal life cycle to process the callback. 使用方法来获取对客户端函数的引用，在调用时，启动到服务器事件的客户端回调。Use the method to obtain a reference to a client function that, when invoked, initiates a client callback to a server event. 有关详细信息，请参阅[实现客户端回调而无需回发](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dfaaa7d4-e1f2-4322-b2f5-796e0419f185)。For more information, see [Implementing Client Callbacks Without Postbacks](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dfaaa7d4-e1f2-4322-b2f5-796e0419f185). > [!NOTE] > 脚本回调中不支持文档对象模型 (DOM) 的低版本浏览器将不工作，并且它们要求客户端上启用了 ECMAScript。Script callbacks will not work in older browsers that do not support the Document Object Model (DOM), and they require that ECMAScript is enabled on the client. 若要检查浏览器是否支持回调，使用属性，它是可通过访问属性的内部函数 ASP.NET对象。To check if the browser supports callbacks, use the property, which is accessible through the property of the ASP.NET intrinsic object. 使用方法和方法用来定义客户端回发事件。Use the method and the method to define a client postback event. 这些方法启用客户端脚本功能，在调用，将导致服务器的回发到页。These methods enable client script functions, when invoked, to cause the server to post back to the page. 在于 Web 页面完成处理客户端回发事件正常生命周期，客户端回发事件是不同的客户端回调。A client postback event is different from a client callback in that the Web page completes a normal life cycle to process the client postback event. > [!NOTE] > 如果你使用控件和属性设置为`false`，则你可以使用方法以返回客户端回发事件控件。If you are using a control and the property is set to `false`, then you can use the method to return the client postback event for the control. 属性控件，控件，和控件可以用于运行客户端脚本。The property of the control, control, and control can be used to run client script. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将方法类。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method of the class. 页中定义两个客户端脚本： `PopupScript`，加载页面后，它会显示一条警告消息和`ButtonClickScript`，后者定义一个 HTML 按钮的客户端处理`onClick`事件。Two client scripts are defined in the page: `PopupScript`, which displays an alert message when the page is loaded, and `ButtonClickScript`, which defines a client handler for an HTML button's `onClick` event. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager1/cs/page_registerstartupscriptcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager1/vb/page_registerstartupscriptvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法执行的带回调到是页面的常规生命周期的修改的版本的服务器。The method performs an out-of-band callback to the server that is a modified version of a page's normal life cycle. 有关详细信息，请参阅[实现客户端回调而无需回发](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dfaaa7d4-e1f2-4322-b2f5-796e0419f185)。For more information, see [Implementing Client Callbacks Without Postbacks](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dfaaa7d4-e1f2-4322-b2f5-796e0419f185). > [!NOTE] > Microsoft Internet Explorer （版本 5.0 或更高版本） 浏览器时，脚本回调机制通过 Microsoft.XmlHttp COM 对象实现，并要求设置为运行 ActiveX 控件的浏览器。When the browser is Microsoft Internet Explorer (version 5.0 or later), the script callback mechanism is implemented through the Microsoft.XmlHttp COM object and requires the browser to be set to run ActiveX controls. 对于其他浏览器，将使用 XMLHttpRequest 使用浏览器的本地文档对象模型 (DOM)。For other browsers, an XMLHttpRequest using the browser's local Document Object Model (DOM) is used. 若要检查浏览器是否支持客户端回调，请使用属性。To check whether a browser supports client callbacks, use the property. 若要检查浏览器是否支持通过 HTTP XML，请使用属性。To check whether a browser supports XML over HTTP, use the property. 两个属性都可通过访问属性的内部函数 ASP.NET对象。Both properties are accessible through the property of the intrinsic ASP.NET object. 重载方法执行同步通过 HTTP 使用 XML 的回调。The overload of the method performs a callback synchronously using XML over HTTP. 发送数据时同步在回调方案中，同步的回调将立即返回，不会阻止浏览器。When sending data synchronously in a callback scenario, synchronous callbacks return immediately and do not block the browser. 没有两个同步回调可以在浏览器中同时执行。No two synchronous callbacks callback can execute at the same time in the browser. 如果其中一个当前挂起时激发的第二个同步回调，第二个同步回调取消第一个，并仅在第二个回调将返回。If a second synchronous callback is fired while one is currently pending, the second synchronous callback cancels the first and only the second callback will return. 若要以异步方式发送数据，请使用采用的重载之一`useAsync`参数，这是一个布尔值，该值控制此行为。To send data asynchronously, use one of the overloads that takes the `useAsync` parameter, which is a Boolean value controlling this behavior. 在异步方案中，你可以有多个挂起回调;但是，在其中它们返回的顺序不保证按照启动时的顺序相匹配。In the asynchronous scenario you can have multiple pending callbacks; however, the order in which they return is not guaranteed to match the order in which they were initiated. 此外，此重载方法指定要处理的情况生成的错误条件的任何客户端函数方法。Additionally, this overload of the method specifies no client function to handle the case of an error condition generated by the method. 若要指定客户端错误回调处理程序，请使用采用的重载之一`clientErrorCallback`参数。To specify a client error callback handler, use one of the overloads that takes the `clientErrorCallback` parameter. 方法采用一个可选的字符串`argument`参数并返回一个字符串。The method takes an optional string `argument` parameter and returns a string. 若要在传递或接收多个值，串联输入中的值或分别返回字符串。To pass in or to receive multiple values, concatenate values in the input or return string, respectively. > [!NOTE] > 避免使用页或控件的属性，则需要在脚本回调操作时更新的实现中的视图状态。Avoid using the view state in the implementation of page or control properties that need be updated during script callback operations. 如果属性都得以页请求，你可以使用会话状态。If the properties are to survive page requests, you can use session state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用两个重载递增整数的客户端回调方案中的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use two overloads of the method in a client callback scenario that increments integers. 两个回调机制都会显示出来;它们之间的区别是使用`context`参数。Two callback mechanisms are shown; the difference between them is the use of the `context` parameter. A`ReceiveServerData1`提供客户端回调函数则使用`context`参数。A `ReceiveServerData1` client callback function is provided using the `context` parameter. 与此相反，`ReceiveServerData2`客户端回调函数定义中`

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载方法采用`target`字符串参数而不是参数。This overload of the method takes a `target` string parameter instead of a parameter. 当您希望该回调返回以外的一个字符串，包含使用此重载的控件。Use this overload when you want the callback to go back to something other than a string containing the of the control. 此外，此重载方法需要`useAsync`和`clientErrorCallback`参数。Additionally, this overload of the method requires a `useAsync` and a `clientErrorCallback` parameter. `useAsync`参数使你可以通过将该值设置为以异步方式执行客户端回调`true`。The `useAsync` parameter allows you to perform the client callback asynchronously by setting the value to `true`. 不需要此方法的重载版本`useAsync`参数的值设置为`false`默认情况下。The overload versions of this method that do not require the `useAsync` parameter set the value to `false` by default. `clientErrorCallback`参数允许你定义在调用了客户端函数的名称服务器的处理程序，方法，将返回错误。The `clientErrorCallback` parameter allows you to define the name of the client function that is called if the server handler, the method, returns an error. 不需要此方法的重载版本`clientErrorCallback`参数将值设置为 null。The overload versions of this method that do not require the `clientErrorCallback` parameter set the value to null. 此方法的详细信息，请参阅备注的重载方法。For more information on this method, see the remarks for the overload method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用两个重载递增整数的客户端回调方案中的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use two overloads of the method in a client callback scenario that increments integers. 两个回调机制都会显示出来;它们之间的区别是使用`context`参数。Two callback mechanisms are shown; the difference between them is the use of the `context` parameter. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回对嵌入到程序集中的资源的 URL 引用。The method returns a URL reference to a resource embedded in an assembly. 返回的引用不是编码的 URL。The returned reference is not URL encoded. 资源可以是脚本文件、 图像或任何静态文件。Resources can be script files, images, or any static file. 指定基于将访问资源的对象的类型。You specify the type based on the object that will be accessing the resource. 注册页的 Web 资源唯一标识由其类型和名称。A Web resource registered with the page is uniquely identified by its type and name. 可以使用页注册给定的类型且名称对一个资源。Only one resource with a given type and name pair can be registered with the page. 尝试注册已注册的资源不会创建已注册的资源的副本。Attempting to register a resource that is already registered does not create a duplicate of the registered resource. 结合使用方法方法，用于访问资源嵌入程序集中。The method is used in conjunction with the method for accessing resources embedded in assemblies. 有关使用应用程序中的资源的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 网页资源概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0936b3b2-9e6e-4abe-9c06-364efef9dbbd)。For more information on using resources in applications, see [ASP.NET Web Page Resources Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0936b3b2-9e6e-4abe-9c06-364efef9dbbd). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method. *类型*在此示例中的参数设置为包含该资源的程序集中的类的类型。The *type* parameter in this example is set to the type of class in the assembly containing the resource. `resourceName`参数指定与资源，其中包括默认命名空间的完全限定路径。The `resourceName` parameter is specified with the fully qualified path to the resource, which includes the default namespace. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager4/cs/clientscriptwebresource.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager4/vb/clientscriptwebresource.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式应用用于标记将提供服务的资源的程序集的元数据属性。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically apply the metadata attribute to mark the assembly for the resources that will be served. 使用默认命名空间设置为编译类库中的以下类`Samples.AspNet.CS.Controls`或`Samples.AspNet.VB.Controls`，取决于你使用哪种语言。Compile the following class in a class library with a default namespace set to `Samples.AspNet.CS.Controls` or `Samples.AspNet.VB.Controls`, depending on what language you are using. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager4#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager4/cs/resource.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager4#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager4/vb/resource.vb#2)] 此示例需要名为的 JavaScript 文件`Script_include.js`。This example requires a JavaScript file named `Script_include.js`. .Js 文件是中包含的程序集的嵌入的资源`ClientScriptResourceLabel`对象。The .js file is an embedded resource in the assembly that contains the `ClientScriptResourceLabel` object. 如果你使用 Visual Studio]，在该类库项目属性窗口中，设置**生成操作**到**嵌入的资源**选中脚本文件。If you are using Visual Studio], in the Properties window of the class library project, set **Build Action** to **Embedded Resource** when the script file is selected. 如果您正在编译的库在命令行，请使用开关来嵌入资源。If you are compiling the library at the command line, use the switch to embed the resource. ``` function DoClick() {Form1.Message.value='Text from resource script.'} ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法之前调用方法可避免注册重复的脚本。Call this method before calling the method to avoid registering duplicate scripts. 这一点特别重要，如果该脚本需要大量服务器资源进行创建。This is particularly important if the script requires a large amount of server resources to create. 由它的键和其类型唯一地标识客户端脚本。A client script is uniquely identified by its key and its type. 具有相同键和类型的脚本被视为重复项。Scripts with the same key and type are considered duplicates. 此重载方法调用的重载采用同时`key`和`type`与类型参数设置为对象This overload of the method calls the overload that takes both a `key` and a `type` parameter with the type set as a object ## Examples [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager1/cs/page_registerstartupscriptcs2.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager1/vb/page_registerstartupscriptvb2.aspx#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法注册的名称/值对，对指定的自定义 (expando) 特性。The method registers a name/value pair as a custom (expando) attribute on the specified . Expando 属性是动态设置从 JavaScript 保持与呈现的控件的标记 XHTML 兼容性。The expando attribute is set dynamically from JavaScript to preserve XHTML compatibility for the rendered control's markup. 设置`encode`参数`true`如果你需要进行转义引号和 expando 属性的值中的反斜杠。Set the `encode` parameter to `true` if you need to escape quotes and backslashes in your expando attribute's value. 如果未找到 expando 属性或者未找到要添加到 expando 特性的控件，仍发出客户端脚本，但它将不会影响该控件。If the expando attribute is not found or the control to add the expando attribute to is not found, the client script is still emitted, but it will not affect the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method of the class. 中的呈现的页面集的客户端脚本`title`属性``元素。The client script in the rendered page sets the `title` attribute of a `` element. remarks.format: ## Remarks 由它的键和其类型唯一标识某 OnSubmit 语句。An OnSubmit statement is uniquely identified by its key and its type. 语句具有相同键和类型均被视为重复。Statements with the same key and type are considered duplicates. 可以使用页注册只有一条语句与给定的类型和密钥对。Only one statement with a given type and key pair can be registered with the page. 尝试注册已注册的语句不会创建重复的语句。Attempting to register a statement that is already registered will not create a duplicate of the statement. 调用方法来确定是否可以使用给定的键和类型对已注册某 OnSubmit 语句，从而避免不必要地尝试添加该脚本。Call the method to determine whether an OnSubmit statement is already registered with a given key and type pair and avoid unnecessarily attempting to add the script. `script`参数方法可包含多个脚本命令，只要它们是正确分隔用分号 （;）。The `script` parameter of the method can contain multiple script commands as long as they are properly delimited with a semicolon (;). 添加一个页面提交并使你能够取消提交之前执行的脚本。The adds a script that is executed before the page is submitted and gives you an opportunity to cancel the submission. 有关 HTML 窗体上的详细信息和`OnSubmit`属性，请参阅[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 网站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information on HTML forms and the `OnSubmit` attribute, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager3/cs/clientscriptonsubmit.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager3/vb/clientscriptonsubmit.aspx#1)]
